WebsiteName	Main Website

request.headers.User-Agent	Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_11_1) AppleWebKit/601.2.4 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/9.0.1 Safari/601.2.4 facebookexternalhit/1.1 Facebot Twitterbot/1.0

Here: app/code/local/Regiondo/WhiteLabel/Block/Design.php:86 we have the following:

$html = $this->getDesign()->getHeaderHtml();

Please consider any other places like this. Might make sense to return with $this->getDesign() always an object (empty if no other possible)

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1572182342361,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-15605","entityId":"86-18039","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Alter booking] Extend functionality to be able to select another product "},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Yann Maurer"},{"name":"created","value":"1540485198087"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15605"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/bookingsview/key/2-196117-25849-1541172600/

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Get a customer phone call that booked an activity (e.g. Werktour)
  2. The customer wants to join the tour tomorrow instead of today
  3. The Werktour tomorrow is fully booked
  4. You propose an alternative tour to the customer (Turmfahrt)
  5. He accepts the alternative

Actual result:

A user can only propose an alternative appointment date and time for the original product that has been booked
In order to propose an alternative activity, you have to cancel the booking and place a new booking

Expected result:

User should be able to propose an alternative activity without having to cancel the booking and re-entering the customer data

UI if no other activity is selected:

UI if another activity is selected:

Clickdummy:
https://marvelapp.com/1cji4g0g/screen/53191469

Loading State

Please keep the same logic as in our POS

Copy

EN

Old
New

Offer
Price for
Appointment
Price category

Previous total
New total

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1571417604963,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"dev-15988","entityId":"86-18319","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Bundle] Add Gift certificate module for Bundle"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1543843645434"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15988"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://regiondo-demo-account-muenchen.regiondo.fr/packs-promo
Product ID56647
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo.de
Supplier ID9357
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Step to reproduce:

1- Go to Dashboard » Manage Offers » My Offer Bundles
2- Preview offer ID 56647

Actual result:

We can't buy gift certificate for bundle activities

Expected result:

  • FRONT END

1- Add Gift voucher module to bundle offers

1- A : 1 gift certificate code should be valid of all bundle activities.

1- B :Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :

  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people

2- After buying gift voucher for bundle offer, Customer should be able to redeem his voucher in the normal redeeming link and in POS

2- A : Redeeming voucher template, should propose
Font end :
Back end :

2- B- Show Custom order option if the Redeeming voucher template if bundle offer require one

2- C : if there is no availabilities , show supplier information (Company name , phone , Email address)

Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact %s company name :
%s phone
%s Email address

Wording
EN : Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact the supplier
FR : Malheureusement il n'y a pas de rendez-vous disponible, nous vous invitons de contacter le prestataire
DE : Leider ist kein Termin verfügbar, wir laden Sie ein, sich mit dem anbieter in Verbindung zu setzen:

  • POS

3- Ability to buy Gift voucher in POS

3- A- Display bundle Offer when we select Gift certificate

3- B - Same logic as in Front- end should be applied in POS

  • 1 code valid for all bundle activities.
  • Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :
  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people
  1. Availability of bundle voucher should be taken from Dashboard » Manage Offers » Ticket validity

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1549463861599,"updated":1549463871213,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-15803","entityId":"86-18656","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Dashboard Calendar] Display assignee in notes "},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Bechte"},{"name":"created","value":"1547720704459"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15803"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/reseller/calendar/settings
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo.de

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Login into demoaccount@regiondo.de
  2. Go to dashboard calendar
  3. Go to dashboard calendar settings

Actual result:

The option to tick "Assignee" as a card field option is displayed.
!image.png!

But no assignee is displayed after ticking this option.

Expected result:

Additional to the booking notes, the assignee should be displayed via mouse over in the dashboard calendar when option is chosen in the calendar settings.

Design notes:

  • On the top right corner, the "triangle shaped" mouse over trigger has been made slightly larger. I had to do this to achieve the even margin.
  • There is a 5 pixel margin on the top/left/right side of the booking note.
  • The assignee square has a redius set to 2.

Proposal

Here you will find my proposal for the multiple assignees.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1568360973220,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-62141","author":"alexander.bechte","authorFullName":"Alexander Bechte","issueId":"dev-15803","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

There you are using circle pictures and here not. We need to be consistent with these styles.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1569593076400,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-62164","author":"g.horvath","authorFullName":"György Horváth","issueId":"dev-15803","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Update

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1569837266736,"updated":1569837285688,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-15826","entityId":"86-18705","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[ACL] Add permissions caching"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Bogdan Pyvovar"},{"name":"created","value":"1548319450040"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15826"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/thisiswherewehaveanissue
:
-------:

Currently, we fetch all the permissions from the database. We need to add caching layer to reduce the amount of database requests.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Login with eyetracking@regiondo.com
  2. Go to booking #3563204166
  3. Go to 'Alter booking'
  4. Alter the booking to 31st of August 2019

Actual result:

When you change a booking, there a long loading times which creates confusion. That leads to multiple clicks to change the booking as you can see on the screen.

Expected result:

Please decide which the following options is suitable for now and also for our future growing.

Option 1)
Increasing the performance so that there is no time gap (less than 1 sec.) between clicking and confirmation.

Option 2)
Insert a symbol to show while loading

See this comment regarding the symbol:
https://track.regiondo.com/issue/IDEAS-176#focus=streamItem-88-60022.0-0

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1563272001694,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-60022","author":"g.horvath","authorFullName":"György Horváth","issueId":"dev-16502","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Update

V01

Based on current user flow:
https://marvelapp.com/4cad3hh/screen/59361546

V02

I do not suggest to navigate user to another page without permission, like on V01. It's against the "keeping user in control" UX rule. I kindly suggest the following flow:
https://marvelapp.com/9516gid/screen/59361793

Note:

  • The interface should not be clickable during orange modal window displayed.
  • The the progress animation is based on this: https://material.io/design/components/progress-indicators.html#circular-progress-indicators
